titles.title: A resolution providing for a motion to recede and concur in Senate amendment numbered 119 to the bill (H. R. 4637) making appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1989, and for other purposes, with an amendment.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-996.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 303 - 84 (Record Vote No: 366).

bill.summary: 9/28/1988--Introduced. Makes it in order to consider a motion to recede and concur in a Senate amendment with an amendment to H.R. 4637 (foreign operations and related programs funding).
